PersonalStatement.text: Debbie Heath, born on 1964-08-13, is a Female based in Ashleymouth, Brazil. She is Single and holds Singaporean nationality. Currently working at Barber-Newton.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Richardson-Case from 2009 to 2020.
Senior HR Manager at Barber-Newton, 2022 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Bachelor's in Civil Engineering from University of Dundee
Master's in Engineering from Universidad de Córdoba - Colombia

PersonalSkills.text: Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys gardening.
